alert.note: Alert for Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yadkin County through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yadkinville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... Boonville... East Bend... Nebo... Buck Shoals... and Brooks Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia.
